excerpt: "The robotics industry has proven its mettle amid the Covid-19 pandemic with machines taking the place of humans in order to stave off further infections from the virus. That said, a recent Robotics & Automation News article identified additional trends that can only further the expansion of the robotics industry--good news for ETFs like the Robotics & AI Bull 3X ETF  (NYSEArca: UBOT)."
